arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلۡمُسۡتَضۡعَفِينَ مِنَ ٱلرِّجَالِ وَٱلنِّسَآءِ وَٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنِ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ حِيلَةٗ وَلَا يَهۡتَدُونَ سَبِيلٗا
translation: (98) Except for the oppressed among men, women and children who cannot devise a plan nor are they directed to a way[213] -
footnotes: [213]- They are prevented by circumstances beyond their control.
